everyXMessages.title: Remind every X messages
everyXMessages.help: 0 = disabled; both remind conditions must be true to bot print remind

everyXSeconds.title: Remind every X seconds
everyXSeconds.help: 0 = disabled; both remind conditions must be true to bot print remind

title: Title
cannotCopyIfInProgress: Cannot copy, if another poll is in progress
cannotCreateIfEmpty: Cannot create new poll without at least 2 options
cannotCreateWithoutTitle: Cannot create new poll without title
cannotCreateNewVoteIfInProgress: Cannot create new poll, if another poll in in progress
